Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Blurry \Blur"ry\ (bl[^u]r"r[y^]), a. Full of blurs; blurred. [1913 Webster]
blurry adj : indistinct or hazy in outline; "a landscape of blurred outlines"; "the trees were just blurry shapes" [syn: {bleary}, {blurred}, {foggy}, {fuzzy}, {hazy}, {muzzy}]
